column5: I'm planning a second trip to Canada this summer and rather than haul my boat all the way home and then back again 3 weeks later, I'm thinking about storage in International Falls. Is anyone aware of a secure, enclosed facility that provides short-term storage? Thanks
Call 1-800-FALLS-MN That's the chamber there. They will point you in the right direction.
Most Marina's on the Canadian side allow storage (at least the ones around Morson do). You wouldn't even have to drive it back across the border.
Many resorts will allow you to store your boat there as well. Security depends on location, facilities, and the owners.
